revert_description: The action allows you to reverse the order of characters in a sentence.
replace_description: The action allows you to replace the selected phrase in a sentence with another one.
old_legend: Enter the value you want to replace.
new_legend: Enter the value that will be used for replacement.
error_legend: Should ignore potential errors when performing actions?
censor_description: The action allows you to censor the given values.
censored_phrases_legend: Enter the values to be censored.
from_base64_description: The action allows conversion from base64 format to text
to_base64_description: The action allows conversion from text to base64 format
select_action_label: Please select shares from the drop-down list:
base_text_placeholder_label: Please select the text for further editing.
result_text_placeholder_label: The result of performing the defined actions will appear here.
